amendment.description: Amendment adds the House Committee on Foreign Affairs and the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations to the reporting requirements in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Poliquin.
